sub_title: Science communicator, Event organizer, Science Educator
summary:
I am an educator and science communicator with a background in research in Paleoclimate and Geo-ecosystems, Modern and past climate change.

For the past five years, I have worked as a science communicator, organizing and leading weekly events about topics such as astrophysics, planetary science, space travel and on another front climate science and sustainability, environmental policy that bring inspiration and passion for science to a diverse audience. As the main organizer of these events, I have developed strong leadership and communication skills, working collaboratively with a team of volunteers to create engaging and interactive experiences that make science come alive for audiences of all ages.

While I have enjoyed my experiences in academia and research, I am now in the process of transitioning to a place where I can fully focus mainly on education. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my passion, skills, and experience to a more active teaching role.

volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'role': 'Knowledge Specialist', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Center for Complexity Studies', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQFysFez39oHBA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519881445902?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=sILf6-sStNFAaRDXuYSbItKnU4ojJZbI6GC72njkQ6g', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/center-for-complexity-studies/'}, 'cause': 'EDUCATION', 'description': 'My role here as a volunteer was to facilitate a technical support for livestreaming the weekly talks titled " Complexity Cafe " on science and technology and their meaning for humanity in the 21st century - talks given by professors, researchers and in general by people with an interesting and thought provoking story to tell. The talks also tackled many issues that humanity is challenged with in our current age but also science communication occasionally. 

I also gave a talk on the history of the planet,  the complex relations and interplay between the evolution of life on Earth and the continuously changing surface of our planet - be it plate tectonics shifting continents, climate shifting from a " hothouse " climate to a glacial world in which we live today. 
  
The Center for Complex Studies (CSC) (2005-2013) – it promotes the study of the Complexity Sciences: Chaos Theory, Fractal Geometry, etc – and in general, methods of analyzing and understanding nonlinear, complex systems by implementing methods of non-formal education, creative approaches for transmitting to the young and the students the fascination for this field of study and the fascination for science in general.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'role': 'Translator', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'TED Translators', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEOGyNptcOTbg/company-logo_400_400/0/1590170988514?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=xz04z3B75_POB41KVE6aXb6uimNw0XH92uPgJdgtk3o', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ted-translators/'}, 'cause': 'SCIENCE_AND_TECHNOLOGY', 'description': 'My role here was to be a volunteer translator for the “ TED Open Translation Project ”. TED.com is the site of the TED interdisciplinary conferences that bring together some of the most important researchers, thinkers and innovative entrepreneurs of the period we live in. Speakers like: Stephen Hawking, Benoit Mandelbrot or Richard Dawkins, Jane Goodall, etc. The motto of TED is: ideas worth spreading.

You can see here the talks for which I translated the subtitles from english to romanian:

https://www.ted.com/profiles/248001/translator
